original_title: Namal requests President to bring back Rajapaksas’ money from Uganda
original_body_lines: MP Namal Rajapaksa requested President Ranil Wickremesinghe to facilitate the return of funds allegedly taken by the Rajapaksas to Uganda.
“If the Rajapaksas have taken money to Uganda, I request the President and the government to intervene and bring the money back on the same flights,” he said.
